column4: WEP and not broadcasting SSID is enough that you'll probably never have somebody unauthorized on your network
and if you want more peace of mind, just enable mac filtering
well you can still fake mac addresses
which does you no good if all macs allowed are already on
there are ways in trust me.
you can arp poison with one of the allowed mac's
the only safe way is wpa
No wow can run on wine
I use my hand to do it the right way.
